name: Bonfire Night
description:
TURN SOUND ON FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

Gameplay:

Cut wood and throw the wood into the fire, so that the hunter does not fall asleep! The Hunter will shoot all enemies at the fireplace, but only as long as the fire blazes!

  • The Arrow will guide you back to the fireplace
  • Being near the fireplace will heal you

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left click on item to pickup or throw
  • Move axe over trees (with your mouse) to cut wood
  • Throw your axe (left click) to stun enemies

Credits:

  • Design: Alex
  • Soundtrack: HoliznaCC0
